snippet.title: [Under the Radar Part 131]: Chick chaser [Aussie]
snippet.description:
Chick Chaser is a point'n'click adventure game, developed with Adventure Game Studio, in which you must attempt to get your girlfriend back after an argument. It's all reasonably polished and the dialogue actually might draw a laugh or two if your in the mood for humour.

Download: http://www.agsarchives.com/gamecard/499/chick-chaser.html

Quote Unquote - Indie Videogame Developers, one quote at a time: http://quote-un-quote.tumblr.com/
The Big List of Indie Videogame Developers: http://www.squidoo.com/indie-games
C:\INDIE GAMES\ http://www.youtube.com/user/Slumlord27
Twitter: http://twitter.com/moshboy
